Plot: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that a couple he is spying on will be murdered.
Title: The Conversation
Actors: Gene Hackman, John Cazale, Allen Garfield, Frederic Forrest
tomatoConsensus: This tense, paranoid thriller presents Francis Ford Coppola at his finest -- and makes some remarkably advanced arguments about technology's role in society that still resonate today.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 14 wins & 13 nominations.
